Sentencas: The data presented in this article are related to the research article entitled Phase stability and transport characteristics of (ZrO2)(1-x)(Sc2O3)(x)(CeO2)(y) and (ZrO2)(1-x-y-z)(Sc2O3)(x)(CeO2)(y)(Y2O3)(z) solid solution crystals https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2352340917302329
Titulo: Data on physical and electrical properties of (ZrO2)1-x(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y and (ZrO2)1-x-y-z(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y(Y2O3)z solid solution crystals

Sentencas: It contains data on densities and microhardness of the as-grown crystals.
Titulo: Data on physical and electrical properties of (ZrO2)1-x(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y and (ZrO2)1-x-y-z(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y(Y2O3)z solid solution crystals

Sentencas: The data on the specific conductivity of the as-grown and annealing at 1000 degrees C for 400 h ScCeSZ and ScCeYSZ crystals in the temperature range 623-1173 K is also included in this article.
Titulo: Data on physical and electrical properties of (ZrO2)1-x(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y and (ZrO2)1-x-y-z(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y(Y2O3)z solid solution crystals

Sentencas: The article describes also the growth of the (ZrO2)(1-x)(Sc2O3)(x)(CeO2)(y) and (ZrO2)(1-x-y-z)(Sc2O3)(x)(CeO2)(y)(Y2O3)(z) solid solution crystals using directional melt crystallization in a cold crucible.
